MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL60 postcode area of Gaerwen, affecting properties in the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations needed to locate and repair the fault  and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:47PM on 16th November 2020.
